front.title: A guide to United States apparel and household textiles compliance requirements

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology
National Institute of Standards and Technology
National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.)

front.abstract: This guide addresses wearing apparel, including children's apparel, and household textiles. It does not include other textiles, such as sleeping bags, tents, sporting goods, or other non-household products that contain or are made from textile materials.
